title: Base Event
description: Base schema for all TheBoard events. Provides common fields for event routing, tracing, and correlation. All component events extend this base.

event_type.description: Event discriminator for routing (e.g., 'theboard.meeting.created'). Used by Bloodbank for topic-based routing.

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 UTC timestamp when event was emitted

meeting_id.description: UUID of the meeting this event relates to. Used for event correlation and tracing.
